answers.answer:
The use of stable coins for payments & cross-border transactions is one of the largest real world use-cases of crypto and blockchain technologies.
However, the lack of privacy on-chain has always been a huge barrier to the adoption for stable coins for both the everyday user and institutions. Everyday users and institutions require a certain level of privacy akin to a traditional bank account before they will feel comfortable adopting stable coins for everyday usage. Stablecoin transactions on public blockchains expose sensitive data, including amounts, senders, and recipients, leading to significant privacy concerns for both businesses and individuals.

In addition, existing privacy solutions either require the use of specific blockchains or do not adhere to regulatory or compliant standards.

Axiompay enables private and secure stable coin transfers by decoupling privacy from the underlying blockchain in a regulatory compliant manner through the use of smart contract directly deployed on-chain. We believe that enabling private transfers will significantly drive the adoption of stable coin usage for both individuals and institutions.
answers.question: How does your project contribute significantly to the Ethereum network's infrastructure? Please provide specific examples and metrics if available.

answers.answer: AxiomPay enhances the privacy of existing popular stablecoin contracts by combining zero-knowledge proof payment verification, homomorphic encryption for balance calculations, and MPC-based View Key technology. It maintains the protocol's composability, portability, and user-friendliness.
answers.question: Describe any pioneering development work in your project, particularly in enhancing privacy, interoperability, or user experience.

answers.answer:
Axiompay directly addresses the privacy issue for stablecoin transfers through the use of smart contract implementations, decoupling privacy from the underlying blockchain.

While existing implementations of privacy preserving protocols such as Tornadocash exist on Ethereum, these solutions are not regulatory compliant and not viable options for institutions and everyday users as transactions that run through well known mixers like tornado cash often become flagged for suspicious or illegal activities.
Even with more advanced privacy enhancing protocols like Aztec, these are not very accessible to the everyday user and requires assets to sit on a specific chain.

Axiompay enables secure and private transactions directly for the Ethereum ecosystem

answers.answer: Currently our core smart contracts are already completed. Funds will be used for audits and development of our own Axiompay app for users to easily access private and secure transfers. We will also be developing a SDK for businesses, that allow them to directly integrate private transfers of stablecoins in their existing payment flow.

project.title: AxiomPay
project.description:
AxiomPay is a privacy preserving protocol for Stablecoin payments 


The stablecoin market is growing rapidly on Ethereum  but true adoption of stablecoins for payments is still limited by a lack of privacy on the blockchain. 

With the constant improvement of on-chain tracking & analysis tools, we see three key problems with Stablecoin payments:

(1) Account Balances Leaked 
(2) Transaction data details Leaked 
(3) Disclosure of payment execution relationship Graphs 


AxiomPay aims to expand existing stablecoin payments that can simultaneously support both real-world and virtual payments, while ensuring user privacy and meeting the criteria of portability, regulatory compliance, high performance, and user-friendliness

Further Reading:

Pitch Deck: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1VnErJL-BDm5suPjYNfQGvQYbJ7-TFGfd/view?usp=drive_link
